posts.name: UnofficialForth
posts.cooked: Just remembered this video existed , and it’s an absolutely adorable way to learn about four bar linkages and virtual four bar linkages. Happy Build Season!

posts.name: Stewart Riley
posts.cooked: Milo is absolutely adorable and also really good at explaining four bar and virtual four bar arms. Hopefully they have graduated to an FTC or FRC team and are in charge of mechanical.
